title.rendered: TAJ777 News a proud partner with Team New York Strikers in LCT.

content.rendered:
The Legends Cricket Trophy (LCT) which will begin on March 8. As many as one seven are participating in the tournament and a total of 22 matches will be played in Kandy, Sri Lanka until March 19. New York Strikers, Dubai Giants, Delhi Devils, Rajasthan Kings, Colombo Lions, Kandy Samp Army and Punjab Royals are the teams participating in the tournament.

It’s a moment of pride for TAJ777 News to announce our partnership with the New York Super Strikers for the Legends Cricket Trophy. 

TAJ777 News stands as India’s foremost online destination for sports updates, match analyses, summaries, and highlights of international games.

Fans can expect to see legends like Yuvraj Singh, Chris Gayle, Tillakaratne Dilshan, Suresh Raina, Harbhajan Singh, Aaron Finch and Robin Uthappa on the field.

Former India all-rounder Yuvraj Singh is the captain and icon player for the upcoming Legends Cricket Trophy (LCT) Season 2.

New York Superstar Strikers: Yuvraj Singh (captain), Dan Christian, Isuru Udana, Chadwick Walton (wicketkeeper), Jerome Taylor, Ricardo Powell, Alviro Petersen, Nuwan Pradeep, Asela Gunarathne, Chamara Kapugedara, Rahul Sharma, Lahiru Thirimanne 

We’re delighted to support the teams New York Super Strikers participating in this mega sporting event.
